typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		Age as string,
		Salary as string,
		Purchased as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(Country=='France') ~> byCountry
byCountry sink(input(
		Country as string,
		Age as integer,
		Salary as decimal(19,2),
		Purchased as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
